author: Simon Difford
description: Rum and pineapple are just meant to go together. This simple but pleasingly fruity cocktail with ripe pineapple and sugar richness is balanced by cleansing dry white rum and lime citrus acidity.
name: Pineapple Daiquiri #1 (On-The-Rocks)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
